description.0: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.

0.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>16%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>12%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

1.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>20%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>15%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

2.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>18%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

3.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>28%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>21%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

4.0: Increases Normal Attack DMG by <cryo>32%</cryo> and Charged Attack DMG by <cryo>24%</cryo>. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.
